text: @KellyO Governor Cuomo was taking care of business in NY today-on the job dealing with coronavirus. Nurses, doctors taking care of patients. @realDonaldTrump out golfing, no mask, blowing taxpayer money. #TrumpDeathToll100K #TrumpHasNoPlan #TrumpGolfs
